definition: root/stem/origin/source/this/the current/original/inherent/originally/classifier for books, periodicals, files etc
Italy/Italian/abbr. for 意大利[Yi4 da4 li4]

sentences.english: The focus of the interpretation of titles will be laid on the excavation and summary of the lyrics.
sentences.chinese: 每篇題解，重在對雅樂歌辭的本意進行挖掘和概括。

sentences.english: Wrap a Sir, I miss your original meaning probably unlikely inferior get such?
sentences.chinese: 包先生，我想你們的本意大概不致於拙劣得如此吧？

sentences.english: Her heart meant well. I know that.
You say your pictures are all orginal mean?
sentences.chinese: 你們說你們的照片本意是什麼？

sentences.english: She hesitated, but of course she meant to.
sentences.chinese: 她遲疑了一下，當然她本意在如此。

sentences.english: The wording is so ambiguous that it leads to misinterpretations.
sentences.chinese: 措辭晦澀，致使人誤解本意。

sentences.english: I'm not afraid of death, but I'm in no hurry to die.
sentences.chinese: 死亡我並不畏懼，但急着赴死也並非是我的本意。

sentences.english: The translations available today are regarded as paraphrases to facilitate understanding of the actual scripture.
sentences.chinese: 現今的闡釋被認爲是對神聖經典本意的解讀。

sentences.english: Such are more in accordance with God's ideal compared to this prayer of Jabez.
sentences.chinese: 與雅比斯的禱告相比，這些禱告更接近神的本意。

sentences.english: For the person who were hurted by me.
sentences.chinese: 沒有傷害任何人的本意。

sentences.english: She hypnotize him into do thing against his own will.
sentences.chinese: 施催眠術讓他做出違反本意的事。

sentences.english: Don't burn down your house to frighten the mouse away.
sentences.chinese: 本意是毋須燒房趕老鼠，我的理解是大材小用。

sentences.english: He wrested my words from their real meaning.
sentences.chinese: 他曲解了我的話的本意。

sentences.english: His remark was intended as a form of praise.
sentences.chinese: 胡昌明的評論本意是一種讚揚。

sentences.english: Status Offline Don't burn down your house to frighten the mouse away.
sentences.chinese: 本意是毋須燒房趕老鼠，我的理解是大材小用。

sentences.english: The brave man hazards his life, but not his conscience.
sentences.chinese: 英豪的可以冒生命危險，但不冒本意天良危險。
